name: VisualBell
description: Simple visual countdown timer for kids activities. Discovery Mode: Kids/Family. Ship Profile: Client-only. Large, colorful timer display with customizable alerts for routines.
target_user: Parents of children ages 4-10 who need routine structure
core_loop: Set timer duration with simple controls
differentiation: Designed specifically for children with large buttons, bright colors, and no complex settings menu
subscription_fit: Premium themes, additional sound options, and multiple timer presets for different activities
